document_data.caption: A map of [[Silverymoon]] with Rallowglass Ride highlighted in red.
document_data.name: Rallowglass Ride
document_data.Description: Rallowglass Ride ran from the the large east-west street known as [[Many Cats Lane]] down to the Docks in the west side of [[Northbank]]. It crossed [[Dancer's Mask Lane]] along the way.
document_data.Notable Locations: The [[Golden Oak]] inn was located northeast of where Rallowglass Ride intersected Dancer's Mask Lane.
